text: You can edit the commentS form i HubSpot.
each blog has its own form. So if you have an english blog and a german blog the can be translated differently.
Is there a way to show blog post in a reverse order? Rather than most recent, most dated first.

You can apply the `|sort` filter when you set up your `for` loop - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters#sort>
The first parameter of the filter reverses the sort order.
there is a reverse filter as welkl
Is there a way to show related posts, but ignore the current post that you are on? Mine shows 3 related but also shows the one you are currently on. Thanks
Compare the related posts' URL to `{{request.absolute_url}}`, and omit if they are equal.

Is there a way to strip the wrapping html around a custom module in the design tools? I know you can do it by adding the module to a coded template using the code snippet and adding no_wrap=True but I need this for the drag and drop too. I am using a custom module on coded and drag and drop templates. I just need to remove the junk code that the custom module is wrapped in.
I don’t think so, but that would be a nice option

Is there a way to grab an svg file in the file manager and output its contents as inline? For example, in php you can use `echo file_get_contents("logo.svg");` and it will output the inline svg code. We should all start an #isThereAWay channel lol.
I know I could make a template partial and just include it, but I want a way to do this with svgs from the file manager
there is tutorial on this in
Argh can't get the related posts to function—does anything look wrong with this
Heya <@U795QFHDE>! Gotta change the variables in your `{% for post in related_posts %}` function to `{{post.absolute_url}}`
